column1: #: description: Correlated yield obtained with the ZYAM procedure as a function of $|\Delta\Phi|$
column2: averaged over 2 $<|\Delta\eta|<$ 4 in for 0.1 $<p_{T}<$ 1.0 $GeV/c$ and 80 $<N_{offline}^{trk}<$ 105 bins for pp data at $\sqrt =$ 13 $TeV$. The $p_{T}$ selection applies to both particles in the pair. Only statistical uncertainties are given. The subtracted ZYAM constant is given ($C_{ZYAM}$).

column1: #: keyword reactions: P P --> CHARGED X
